mapper.insert: insert into qna_comment (commentcode, qnacode, content, id) values (seq_qnacomment.nextval, #{qnacode}, #{content}, #{id})
mapper.update: update qna_comment set content=#{content}, regdate=sysdate where commentcode=#{commentcode}
mapper.select: select commentcode, qnacode, content, id, regdate from qna_comment where qnacode=#{qnacode} order by commentcode asc
